channel.title: CiTR -- LaughTracks: The Generation Exploitation Podcast
channel.description: LaughTracks is a show about comedy. LaughTracks delivers vinyl comedy records (1950s, 60s, and 70s), contemporary hipster comics, LPs not meant to be funny (but are), and novelty songs performed by bygone character actors. Kliph Nesteroff from the zine Generation Exploitation, hosts.
channel.itunes:summary: LaughTracks is a show about comedy. LaughTracks delivers vinyl comedy records (1950s, 60s, and 70s), contemporary hipster comics, LPs not meant to be funny (but are), and novelty songs performed by bygone character actors. Kliph Nesteroff from the zine Generation Exploitation, hosts.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hosted by Kliph Nesteroff, publisher of the trash popculture zine Generation Exploitation.
channel.itunes:link: CiTR -- LaughTracks: The Generation Exploitation Podcast

item.description: MASON WILLIAMS Overture (INTRO) THE MELACHRINO ORCHESTRA Dinah JOHNNY KEATING & HIS ORCHESTRA San Benedict Theme THE CYRKLE Straighten Out My Messed Up Life THE YUMS YUMS Gonna Be a Big Thing LES BEETHOVEN Pour Moi Ã§a Va SYD DALE All on a summer's Day THE COMMITEE California My Way OTIS SMITH Let her go DEAN PARRISH Determination PAUL PETERSEN Try a Little Tenderness LES COQUETTES Si tu m'aimes FLUEGAL KNIGHTS Everybody Loves My Baby ENNIO MORRICONE Charading Chauffeur in wait Johnny Quest (Interlude) JUST BROTHERS Sliced Tomatoes THE TOYS Deserted KENNY BERNARD What Love Brings WILLIAM SHATNER It was a very good year CYRIL STAPLETON & HIS ORCHESTRA The Italian Job THE WALKER BROTHERS I Can't Let It Happen to You BILLY NICHOLS Would you believe Modern Bride (Interlude) BOB CRANE Theme from F Troop MASON WILLIAMS Life Song (OUTRO)

item.description: The Man with the Golden Arm performed by Billy Strange! Roulette Records 45: Double-O-Seven by The Detergents! From the United Artists Soundtrack From Russia With Love: James Bond with Bongos! The Red Eyed Rats off the MGM-Metro Records LP - James Bond/Goldfinger with music by Kenyon Hopkins! item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #44
item.description: Leroy Holmes plays the theme from The Days of Anger! The Beach Boys sing Girl Don't Tell Me from Summer Days (and Summer Nights!)! Dave Dudley sings Let No Man Tell Me from his Mercury LP Thanks For All The Miles! Bizarre 1969 Earth Records LP: The Groupies featuring Pamela Des Barres and Cynthia Plaster Caster! Combustible Edison! 1967 NBC Television Promos! Wild Man Fisher sings Frank! Is That All There is from the Captiol LP of the same name by Peggy Lee! A Most Peculiar Man performed by Simon & Garfunkel and covered by Lynn & Graham McCarthy!Hurts So Bad by Little Anthony and the Imperials! Al Green's How Can You Mend A Broken Heart from his HI Records LP Let's Stay Together! Don't Wanna Be A Playboy by Archie Bell and The Drells! Bye, Bye Baby courtesy Big Brother and the Holding Company!
item.itunes:subtitle: Songs to Kill Yourself By!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #43
item.description: Chess Record Comedy LP: Moms Wows! Mercury Records release Moms Mabley at the White House Conference! Moms Mabley Breaks up the Network and Moms at The Playboy Club on Chess Records! Moms Mabley Sings!
item.itunes:subtitle: moms Mabley tribute!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #42
item.description: Programmer's Digest: Audio Magazine for early seventies radio DJs! Classic Sesame Street Song: Captiol I! Tony's Theme by Hugo Montenegro from The Lady In Cement Soundtrack! Warner Brothers LP - Richard Pryor: Wanted! The $20,000 Pyramid - clip and theme song! Horrible Canadian nineteen seventies lounge comedy team Malton & Hamilton - Marathon Records LP: Holding Their Own! Sun Ra: The Perfect Man! The Man Who Looked Like Hitler from Bob Newhart Faces Bob Newhart! The theme song to The Phil Silvers Show! Theme song to the Bill Cullen game show Blockbusters! Bob Newhart Show Promo Commercials! Teacher Talks to Teens - Barry M. Moore speaks out against pornographic literature! Theme song from Let's Make a Deal! 1960s Burger King Commercial! Repressed Hostility Blues from Songs of Couch and Consultation by Katie Lee! Theme song from What's My Line? Comedy LP Supershrink by Allen Robin! Dennis Coffey's 1971 Sussex Records 45: Scorpio!
item.itunes:subtitle: Game Show Themes! Richard Pryor! Bob Newhart! Christian Teacher Talks to Teens!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #41
item.description: Highlights from Password with Allen Ludden! Buddy Hackett on The Tonight Show with Johnny Carson! The Riddlers: 1977 Game Show hosted by David Letterman! Gordy Records 45: Just a Little Misunderstanding by The Contours! 1963 Crown Records LP: Sound of The Drags featuring Oil Burner by The Blasters! I Want My Baby Back by Edwin Starr! Mickey Katz and his Orchestra play Cry of the Wild Goose! Spike Jones and his City Slickers! Original 1968 Television Soundtrack LP from the BBC Series Children Talking! Fisher and Marks - obscure 1964 Philadelphia Lounge Comedy Record! Various Drive-in Intermission Commercials! My Baby by The Temptations! Mr. Hot Rod by The Scramblers from the 1964 Wyncote LP: Little Honda! Radio Trailer for Rudy Ray Moore's The Human Tornado! Buddy Hackett's shame: Pickwick LP - The Original Chinese Waiter! The Happening by The Supremes!
item.itunes:subtitle: Drag Race Music! Password with Allen Ludden! Buddy Hackett on The Tonight Show!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #40
item.description: Bert I. Gordon exploitation film trailers! Barry M. Moore speaks out against Swearing on his 1960 Christian LP: Teacher Talks To Teens! Bats in My Belfry by Napolean XIV! The Music From M Squad: 1959 RCA LP! ASCOT 45: Sir Julian hammond organ rendition of The Theme from Seance on a Wet Afternoon! Mercury 45 (We Ain't Got) Nothin Yet by The Blue Magoos! Parrot Records 45 Call My Name by THEM! Captiol Records 45 Do the Freddie by Freddie and the Dreamers! Moms Wows - Moms Mabley on Chess Records! Obscure 1975 Comedy LP: Tom O'Connor Live in Liverpool!
item.itunes:subtitle: Teacher Talks to Teens! Bert I. Gordon Film Trailers! Moms Mabley!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #39
item.description: Psychotic Reaction by The Count Five! Capitol Records LP Mel Brooks and Carl Reiner at the Cannes Film Festival! Strange Pensylvanian Rock N' Roll: The Willy by The Willies! Richard Pryor on Dry Humping! Rare Rochester, New York garage rock by The Invictas: The Hump! Bobby Curtola's Canadian Rock N' Roll 45 - Hitch-Hiker! Bridge Over Troubled Water by Senator Sam J. Erwin! Hockey Related 45s: Clear the Track (Eddie Shack) by Douglas Rankine and The Secrets! Gordie Howe by Big Bob and The Dollars! Canada Dry Ginger Ale Promotional Soundsheet: Montreal Canadien Ralph Backstrom on Offense! Thank God For Bobby Clarke - odd American Hockey promo narrated by John Facenda on Power Play Records! 1983 45 - The Great Gretzky on Fanz Records! Richard Brodeur 1982 song King Richard's Army! The Chipmunks sing All My Lovin! Strange 1966 7 inch produced by The George Martin - The Masters Singers sing The Weather Forecast! Would You Believe by Phil Leeds from the KAPP Records Comedy LP When You're In Love the Whole World is Jewish! Early 1970s LP released by Pan American Airlines: The Name of the Game is Go! Automatic Reaction by Nino and The Ebb Tides!
item.itunes:subtitle: Rare Hockey 45s! Garage Rock! Weirdness!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #38
item.description: Where Evil Grows by The Poppy Family! Mel Brooks on The Electric Company LP! The Monkees Theme Song! Johnny Bond Sings Alabam! Epic Records LP: Here's Godfrey Cambridge - Ready or Not! Audio Trailer for Cotton Comes to Harlem! The Beau Brummels - Nick Venet Orchestra: Music from the drive-in picture Out of Sight! Theme from The FBI by Ray Martin and His Orchestra! Impressionist George Kirby on The Ed Sullivan Show! Harry Nilsson sings the theme from Skidoo (1968)! Various selections from the soundtrack to Skidoo! George Carlin on The Ed Sullivan Show! Our Man Flint by Billy Strange! Message from Americans byJohn Salisbury! Enjoy Yourself - Promo Radio Station LP released by the William B. Tanner Company! Pigmeat Markham - Here Come the Judge!
item.itunes:subtitle: Godfrey Cambridge! Pigmeat Markham! The Ed Sullivan Comedians!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #37
item.description: Wild Man Fisher sings In My Room! The Hollyridge Strings play In My Room! Nancy Sinatra sings (a different song called) In My Room! Mrs. Mills sings Downtown! Jim Backus Lay-Z-Boy advertisement outakes! Love Potion No. 9 in Chinese! The 1971 All in the Family LP on Atlantic Records! The Mary Tyler Moore Theme performed by Sammy Davis Jr! A bizarre 1960 "audio yearbook" - a year of an Illinois high school on vinyl: Thornton T's Off! The Ventures perform Billy Strange's composition The Intruder! 1950s Red Lion Gasoline promo 45 Keep Your Restrooms Clean, Men! 1966 MGM 45: Boy Wonder I Love You featuring Burt Ward and Frank Zappa! A Hard Days Night performed by Peter Sellers! Selections from The Monkees 1969 LP Instant Replay! If the Bomb Falls: Cold War Vinyl Weirdness on how to survive Nuclear Warfare! Honky Tonk Popcorn by Bill Doggett! Theme Song from Hanna-Barbera's Amazing Chan and the Chan Clan! The Teenager's Declaration of Independence by Burt Ward!
item.itunes:subtitle: A 1960 High School Yearbook on Vinyl! In My Room Variations! Comedy!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #36
item.description: One Fine Day by Lighthouse! Awful 1975 XXX Comedy LP: Up Your Ass by Liz Lyons! Steve Carlise's WKRP In Cincinatti LP! The MIDI WKRP Theme! Former child star Joey Viera's instructional 1978 LP: Drum Drops! The MIDI Who's The Boss Theme! The Vanilla Fudge perform The Beat Goes On! ABC's Wide World of Sports Theme Song! 1979 Christian ditty "It's Good to Thank God For Our Toys!" Just Dropped In (To See What Condition My Condition Was In) by Kenny Rogers and the First Edition! Pigmeat Markham and Baby Seals' 1968 Chess Records Comedy LP: The Hustlers! The Muppet Show Theme Song in Hebrew!!! 1972 Partridge Family Fan Club Evatone Soundsheet! Leif Garrett's bizarre late seventies Tigerbeat Evatone Soundsheet! The Turtles' You Showed Me! Radio trailers for Trouble Man (1972), Night of the Lepus (1972) and Black Samson (1974)!
item.itunes:subtitle: Pigmeat Markham! WKRP! Liz Lyons! Partridge Family Fan Club Evatone Soundsheet!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #35
item.description: Don Adams The Joke Thief! Rocky & Hal Hoot-and-Naughty: Awful Washington State lo-fi vanity comedy record! Theme From SWAT as done by The Pops Singers and Orchestra on Peter Pan Records! Get Smart Theme performed by The Ventures! Epic Records LP: The Humor of Rowan and Martin! The Surpremes sing Bah-Bah-Bah from the Motown LP Reflections! Allan Sherman's Hail to Thee, Fat Person from My Son the Nut! James Brown performs Out of the Blue from the SMASH Records LP Showtime! Philadelphia Soul Music legends The Intruders perform Love Is Just Like A Baseball Game! Bizarre 1967 LP: Canadian School Days 1867-2067 - What will school be like one hundred years into the future? 100 Years From Now by The Byrds with Graham Parsons! Golden Records LP Rocky and Friends featuring Bulwinkle! More crazy airchecks from random radio stations of the sixties and seventies!
item.itunes:subtitle: Don Adams: Joke Thief!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #34
item.description: A Tribute to Bill Thompson: Mister Wimple appearances on Fibber McGee and Molly, Audio from Droopy Cartoons, The Hanna-Barbera LP Touche Turtle and The Reluctant Dragon! Hanna-Barbera 45 featuring Three Dog Night's Danny Hutton singing Monster Shindig! The Ventures A Go-Go: Swingin' Creeper! Lloyd Thaxton's Image of a Surfer! Nassau, Bahamas Comedy Record by Harold Cannon and John Norman: Nothing Personal! LSD 25 by The Gamblers! The Original Sweet Georgia Brown 78 by Brother Bones! Don Bowman's From Mexico with Laughs featuring the Tijuana Drum and Bugle Corps LP! The New Zoo Revue: Theme Song and Stay In School ballad from the 1972 Disneyland Records LP! Classic Radio Station IDs and Drive-in Movie ads from the fifties, sixties, and seventies!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tribute to Bill Thompson

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #33
item.description: Soul 45 Times Are Bad by Bobby Barnes! United Artists comedy LP Flender on the Phone by Harold Flender! Belle Barth's Laff Records LP The Customer Comes First! Atlantic LP - Killer Joe's Discotheque - Monkey Time! Space Records: Ken Nordine Narrates a Stereophonic Sound Sampler Sounds in Space! 1956 Golden Records LP Journey to the Moon! The Ames Brothers sing Music From Outer Space! KAPP Records Comedy LP Jose Jiminez The Astronaut! Golden Records 45 Meet Space Pilot Jones by Space Satellite Singers! 1959 LP Adventures in Sound and Space with Col. Frank Ernhart! Promotional 45 put out by The Exxon Corporation: Up Came Oil! 1969 American Standard promotional corporate musical The Bathrooms Are Coming!
item.itunes:subtitle: Outer Space Related Vinyl! Corporate Promotional Records! Belle Barth!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #32
item.description: J.J. Johnson's Across 110th Street Soundtrack LP! Selections from two differents ZOOM Television soundtrack LPs 1974 and 1977! 1955 Radio CJVI acetate album - Enterprise in Action: The Carpetorium! Kellogg's presents The Huckleberry Hound Show - 1960 Colpix LP! 1966 southern soul - After Hour Man and Brought Down by TV and The Tribesman on Hanna-Barbera Records! Kapp Records Garage Rock LP: Little Black Egg by The Nightcrawlers! Louis Nye's Hipster at the Bank! An Evening with Don Knotts routine - Election Night! 1961 Religious Film Strip Record - Parables of Nature! Easter Seals Promo version of Big John by Jimmy Dean!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hanna Barbera Soul Music! Radio CJVI acetate from 1955! Garage rock and comedy!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #31
item.description: Jerry Cole and His Spacemen perform a surf instrumental written by Terry Jacks titled Midnight Surfer! Awful lo-fi comedy record from 1975 recorded near the Vancouver Airport by "comedian" John A. Smith! Yorgi Yorgesson sings Object of My Affection! The How To Murder Your Wife Soundtrack LP with music by Neal Hefti! Hear How To Feel Fit with Barton Horvath! Jimmy Durante introduces The Grass Roots singing Live For Today! Dracula's Greatest Hits featuring Gene Moss singing I Want To Bite Your Hand! Golden Greats of The Smothers Brothers Volume 2! Wilson Pickett - Atlantic 45 - Night Owl! Jack Paar Show pressed onto the Calrton Records LP Selma Diamond Talks! Stan Freberg's Little Blue Riding Hood 45! Jim Gaffigan on Reading!
item.itunes:subtitle: Dracula Sings! Yorgi Yorgesson Sings! Terry Jacks Plays Surf Music!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #30
item.description: The You Are What You Eat Soundtrack featuring: Tiny Tim, The Hawks, Joe Simon, The Electric Flag, Peter Yarrow & Rosko! Verve LP of Rosko narrating Kahlil Gibran's The Prophet! Rosko narrates 1970 Polydor LP Murder at Kent State University! Mercury 45 - Gotta Get Away by The Blue Magoos! 1958 Jim Backus Novelty 45 - Delicious! Creepy Christian Ventriloquism Record - Bob Bradford: Walking Along with Jiggers! New Zealand cockrockers Timberjack: Come to the Sabbat!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tribute to Rosko!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #29
item.description: Michel Legrand's soundtrack music from the Steve McQueen picture The Thomas Crown Affair! Jackie Mason on Broadway! Great Moments from The Tonight Show LP featuring Johnny Carson, Don Rickles, Dean Martin, Buddy Hackett, and Glen Campbell! Claude Dejean's MOOG version of Everybody's Talking! "StenoSpeed - StenoBooster" instructional short hand record! Swim Records - Ray Anthony's Swim Swim C'Mon and Swim! Swim with The Go-Gos - rare 1964 Swiim Record! Bill Dana: Jose Jiminez, The Astronaut! Robert Klein's Child of the Fifties LP! Round Trip Mars from Sounds Galactic's Astromusical Odyssey London Records Phase 4 Stereo LP! Ed Allen Time - fifties exercise LP! Norm Crosby roasts Barry Goldwater!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tonight Show with Johnny Carson Highlights! Swim Music Records! Jose Jiminez, Space Music, Buddy Hackett and more!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #28
item.description: Diamonds Are Forever by Geoff Love and His Orchestra! Greetings From the Stars Pezzaz Tapes featuring Henny Youngman, Phyllis Diller, Ed McMahon, Lynn Redgrave, Don Adams, Sid Caesar, Milton Berle, Scatman Crothers, Doc Serverinson, Foster Brooks, Jonathon Winters, Zsa Zsa Gabor, Shari Lewis and Lambchop, Dom DeLuise! Frank Gallop's Would You Believe? LP - Featuring Son of Irving and Ballad of Irving! Servant of Love by The Van Brothers! Laurie Records' oddity - Rock and Roll: Evolution or Revolution? Stan Freberg's Heartbreak Hotel! Rock-A-Billy Walk by Buddy Knox! George Carlin's Ed Sullivan! Mad Magazine Twists Rock N' Roll with Mike Russo singing "I Found Her Telephone Number on the Boy's Bathroom Wall!" The Philip Morris Country Music Show LP featuring Rockabilly Legend Ronnie Self! Remember the Sixties - Christopher Guest as Bob Dylan on National Lampoon's Radio Dinner LP! Bill Cosby sings Sunny!
item.itunes:subtitle: Greetings From the Stars: Strange Low-Budget Cassettes Featuring Faded Celebrities

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #27
item.description: Lil Markie: Diary of the Unborn Child! The Mechanical Man by Bent Bolt and The Nuts! Lloyd Burry at the Organ! It Don't Feel Good by The Dave Clark Five! Audio from an instructional film about Dish Washing! Relax with Reveen! Looking at a Baby by The Collectors! Evatone Soundsheet: A New Accordian Era by Art Van Damme! Salute to Read-Along-Books: Super Pac-Man! Pac-Man Run For Fun! Charlie Brown's All Stars! The Electric Company - Silent E's From Outer Space! Planet of the Hoojibs! The Jungle Book in French! Garfield in Space! Emperor's New Clothes in French! The Rescuers in French! Raiders of the Lost Ark! Clifford the Big Red Dog Gets A Job! The Get Along Gang and The Bad Loser! Escape from the Gremlins! Muppets Take Manhattan! Star Wars Adventures In Colors and Shapes! Strawberry Shortcake presents Apricot & Hopsalot! The Ventures: Guitar Freakout! Four Keys to Successful Selling LP released by The Businessmen's Record Club! Earthwatch LP: The Affects of Marijuana by Dr. David Suzuki! Museum from the Herman's Hermits LP Blaze! Two Fingers Pointed and I Tell Myself by Sky Saxon and The Seeds! Audio footage of William Shatner's Rocket Man!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Saulte to Read-Along-Books! Weird anti-abortion music! Tons of Garage Rock!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #26
item.description: Al Caiola's Tuff Guitar English Style! George Carlin's Occupation: Foole! Let's Talk About the Atom: 3 LP set from 1960 Released by The United States Atomic Energy Commission! Floyd Cramer plays the theme from Dallas! Jan and Dean Meet Batman! Albert Brooks: Comedy Minus One! Getting Married Greetings From the Stars 1984 Cassette featuring Dom Deluise, Shari Lewis & Lampchop, and Don Adams!
item.itunes:subtitle: Albert Brooks! Jan & Dean Meet Batman! Greetings From the Stars!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #25
item.description: The Sex Explained for Children LP! Moms Mabely Live at the Playboy Club! Mae West sings Nervous! The Carrie Nations on The Beyond the Valley of the Dolls Soundtrack LP! 1975 LP Honor Thy Womanself by the Arlington Street Women's Caucus! Politically Incorrect LP: The Seven Secrets of Selling to Women featuring Dottie Walters! I Enjoy Being a Girl sung by Carmel Quinn! Vaginal Lyrics from the Let My People Come: A Sexual Musical LP! Moms Mabely sings Sunny! Rusty Warren's First LP: Knockers Up! Nichols and May's Improvisations to Music LP! Holiday Magic - Ern Westmore's Facial Exercises LP!
item.itunes:subtitle: International Women's Day through Comedy and Vinyl Records

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #24
item.description: Martin Luther King For President by The Mighty Sparrow! Going Uptown to Harlem by The Chambers Brothers! The Soundtrack to Melvin Van Peebles' Sweet Sweetback's Baadasssss Song! Stu Gilliam At Basin Street West - FAX Adults Only Comedy Record! Eddie Harris' 1975 Atlantic LP -The Reason Why I'm Talkin Shit! Laff of the Party Volume 8 - Dooto Records Comedy Team of Don Bexley and Dave Turner! Godfrey Cambridge Toys with the World! Two different folk songs about the ku klux klan - The Mitchell Trio and The Brothers-In-Law! Redd Foxx jokes about the klan on his 1963 Dooto Records LP Funny Stuff! Sixties Civil Rights Protest audio from the Mercury LP The Sound of Dissent! Richard Pryor with Chevy Chase: The Classic "Word Association" Sketch from the 1976 Saturday Night Live vinyl LP! Walter Cronkite's I Can See It Now - The Harlem Riot track! The Wi-i-i-ild Man: Wild Man Steve! The Risque World of Pearl Bailey: Not Now John! Black Panther Speeches! James Brown's Say It Loud - I'm Black and I'm Proud as performed on an episode of Soul Train!
item.itunes:subtitle: Black History Month in Comedy and Vinyl!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #23
item.description: 1960 Christian Educational LP About Menstruation! Father Daniel A. Lord's Bizarre 1959 LP - "So I'm Dying of Cancer!" Cesar et les Romans 1966 Quebecois Garage Rock! Garage rock from The Moquettes and The Yardbirds! Rodney Dangerfield and Phyllis Diller Comedy Records! Phyllis Diller singing Country Music! George Formby's politically incorrect songs about Mr. Wu! Redd Foxx Live in Las Vegas! Classic K-Tel Records Radio Ads!
item.itunes:subtitle: 1960 Christian LP about Menstruation! Phyllis Diller Sings! Plenty of Garage Rock!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #22
item.description: Selections from Pebbles Volume 3: Flight Reaction by The Calico Wall & Five Years Ahead of My Time by The Third Bardo! John Giminez's Pick Up On This Kid - Anti-Marijuana Christian Lecture LP! Larry Smith - A Campus Happening - Drugs, Drop-outs, and the making of the film Way Out(1967)! Christian Comedy from former Santana member Leon Patillo! Wayne Philpott's Hello Rock - the first ever Christian Comedy LP! Jack Tells It Like It Is: Christian ex-con High School Lecture LP! Rolf Harris' Vancouver Town '71 from his Capitol Records Jake-the-Peg in Vancouver Town LP! Dick Gregory in Living Black and White! Abbott & Costello's Camel Cigarettes Radio Show - Who's On First variation! Mickey Katz and his Orchestra!
item.itunes:subtitle: 1960s Christian Lecture LPs and a Tribute to Word Records

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #21
item.description: Jack Benny Live from Vancouver! Hugo Montenegro's soundtrack music from Viva Max! Mike Warnke's awful 1970s Christian Comedy Records! Early 70s PBS children's records: The Letter People! Washington State Vacation Promo 45! National Ad Council - Disabled Day 45! The Moonglow's Happy Hippo Instro 45! Moms Mabely covers the Isely Brothers! Rare & Awful 1979 McDonald's Evatone Soundsheet: A Message to Our Crew from Ray Kroc, CEO of McDonalds!
item.itunes:subtitle: Jack Benny Live in Vancouver!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #20
item.description: Jerry Colonna's Music for Screaming showcased in its entirety, Promo 45 Wonderful Town: Trail BC, Richard Pryor on the Car Wash soundtrack, Xaviera Hollander: The Happy Hooker LP, 1960 Touch Typing Made Easy, Bob and Ray: This Is Your Bed, You Made It, Now Lie in it, Godfrey Cambridge Live in Las Vegas, Capitol Records' Original Television Cast Album for the Andy Griffith Show, Crappy songs from 1977 Columbia Records' Flintstones and Jetsons LPs, The Blind Man's Penis Song Poem!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Salute to Jerry Colonna

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #19
item.description:
1970s Sesame Street LPs featuring great Joe Raposo compositions like: Rub Your Tummy, STOP, Virgil Veep and the Letter V, My Name is David, The Alphabet Song from Susan Sings the Songs of Sesame Street, Roosevelt Franklin's Alphabet, Yo Yo Master and the Lost Kid, Mobbity Mosely's Month of the Year, V for Victory, Cookie Disco, Subway, The J Friends, The Count's Countdown, Oscar the Grouch and Big Bird Camping in Canada! 1960s Lounge Comedy Records : Bert Henry Live at the Hungry Thigh, Wes Harrison's You Won't Believe Your Ears, Herbert Hiesel German Comedy LP, The Best of Alan King!
The 1980 Gallagher record! More Cuts from the Early Seventies Promo LP Canadian Top 40!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Sesame Street Show

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #18
item.description: Dick Davy: Only White Dude to ever Headline The Apollo Theatre as a Stand Up Comic - his 1968 LP Played in its entirety! Original Television Soundtrack LP from ZOOM! Jay North's 1960 LP Look Who's Singing! Nelson Riddle's Lolita Ya Ya! The Laugh-in '69 LP!
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tribute to Dick Davy!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #17
item.description:
Plenty of Bootleg Background Music from the 1967 Animated Spiderman! Selections from the Original Television Batman Soundtrack LP! It's Superman by The Ned Odum Boys from the Superman Broadway Musical! Intro and Outro from the 1938 Superman Radio Program! Three Tracks from the 1975 Songs and Stories of The Justice League of America LP: Justice League! Plastic Man! Metamorpho!
Three Crusty Adults Only Comedy LPs: 1962's Dave Starr - The Closer the Bone the Sweeter the Meat! 1973's Hector Nicol - Scottish Adults Only! Jack Wakefield Live at the Concord Hotel - 1963!
The Four King Cousins Sing a Cover of the Beach Boys' God Only Knows! Jack LaLanne's Glamour Stretcher Time 10" Blue Vinyl from 1959!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Superhero Special!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #16
item.description:
Al Casey's Guitars, Guitars, Guitars, Surfin Hootenany LP! Jan & Dean sing about the Beach Boys, Chuck Berry, Leslie Gore, and Marvin Gaye! Dick Dale's Capitol LP King of the Surf Guitar! GNP Crescendo 45 Goofy Footer Ho-Dad by Shean & Jenkins! Surfer Joe by the Surfaris! Some Gremmy Stole My Hair Bleach from Jack Marshall's My Son the Surf Nut! Surf Instros by RCA Victor Recording Artists The Astronauts! Kalvin Kool & The Surf Knobs low-fi 1963 LP The Surfer's Beat! GNP Crescendo's Battle of the Surf Bands: Dave Myers & The Surf Tones vs. The Rhythm Kings! How Children's Records Exploited the 1960s Surf Craze! Garage Rock Surf 45 ambiguously titled Beatle Teen Beat on Parkway Records! Electronic Music to Blow Your Mind By: Low Budget Label turns Surf Music Electronic!? The Savage by The Shadows from The Wonderful to be Young Soundtrack! The Fireballs' Chief-Whoop-in-Koff! Jan & Dean's The Anaheim Azuza And Cucamonga Sewing Circle Book Review And Timing Association b/w Honolulu Lulu! The Ventures Surfing LP! Davie Allen and The Arrows Invasion from the Cycle-Delic LP! The Trashmen's King of the Surf 45! The Centurians surf track titled Sano on Del-Fi Records! Waikiki Run: Instrumental Decca Records 45 by The Surfaris! 7" single: Underwater by The Frogmen! Selections from the Soundtrack to Endless Summer by The Sandals! Early 60s Oregonian Surf Band The Satans!
Hot Rod and Drag Race Records - Capitol's Big Sound of the Drags! Del-Fi's The Deuce Coupes! The Big Sound of Gary Usher's Super Stocks - Thunder Road LP! Low Budget Greasy Surf - Sound of the Drags - on Crown Records! The Hondells' When You Don't Have Wheels etc.
item.itunes:subtitle: 1960s Surf Music Marathon!!!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #15
item.description: Red Bird Records 7": Ain't That Nice by The Dixie Cups! 45 of On Backstreet b/w May My Heart Be Cast Into Stone by DynoVoice Recording Artists The Toys! Red Bird Records 45: Remember(Walkin' in the Sand) and Bull Dog by The Shangri-Las! I Met Him on Sunday by The Shirelles! Three Selections from The Sweet Inspirations' Atlantic Records debut LP: I'm So Blue, If I Lose this Dream, Sweet Inspiration! Martha and the Vandellas' Hey There Lonely Boy and Eddie Holman's answer song Hey There Lonely Girl! My Block by The Four Pennies on Laurie Records! 7" singles of Sweet Talking Guy, Up on the Bridge, Lucky Me, He's So Fine, and When the Boy is Happy ... all by The Chiffons! Marci Blaine's one hit wonder Bobby's Girl! Cameo Records single: Wah-Watusi by Dee Dee Sharp!
item.itunes:subtitle: 50s & 60s Rock N' Roll Girl Groups: Non-Stop Wall of Female Sound!!!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #14
item.description: 1971 Calypso 45 Black Superman - Muhammad Ali! Legendary selections from Muhammad Ali vs. Mr. Tooth Decay LP! Bill Cosby sings Disco! Alexi Sayle's Didn't You Kill My Brother! Awful 1970 lo-fi Canadian Comedy Record "Hank the Hobo!" Another bad Canadian Comedy LP titled "Authentic Mainlander Jokes." The Letter People's Mister "S," outrageously groovy kids track from 1976!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Muhammad Ali Show!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #13
item.description: Just One Girl by Garage Rock Faves The Knickerbockers! Hockey with a Little Help From Your Friends: The 1976 Vancouver Canucks LP! 1972 Hockey Night in Canada LP! The Brothers-In-Law Hockey Night in Canada 1967 folk song! 1970 Arc Records Album: The Two Sides of Bobby Orr! Groovy, Brassy, 1967 song: They're Taking All the Fun Right Out of Hockey! Marty Allen & Steve Rossi Live at the "Swinging" Sands Hotel Las Vegas 1963! Rusty Warren Live at the Aladdin Hotel Las Vegas 1966! Excerpts from a Children's Record called The Five Senses that sound totally Pornographic! Kaptain Kool and The Kongs: The Krofft Supershow 1978 LP! Mister Rogers sings a songs about "downing liquid solution" and hallucinating!!! Henny Youngman's Life Story from the 1955 Coral Record Album Laugh of the Party! Mort Sahl mocks Walt Disney! The Stan Freberg Radio Show with Daws Butler! Replogle Company's Promotional 1962 7" single The Story of Mr. World - a record that came with your new Globe! Two Tracks off the Rare "Way Out West" Mae West LP - Shaking All Over and Mae Day!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mae West Sings! Pornographic Kids Records! Rare Hockey LPs!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #12
item.description: Rare cuts from the 1966 United Artists GET SMART LP! Billy Strange's Rawkin Fuzz Guitar Interpretation of The Get Smart Theme Song! Jack Klugman & Tony Randall: The Odd Couple Sings! Barry White Foul Mouthed Outakes! Awful 1970s Adults Only Comedy Records from Wild Man Steve and Reynaldo Rey! The All in the Family LP!
item.itunes:subtitle: Ode to Thy Sitcom

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #11
item.description: Jackie Vernon's Hackneyed Canned Laughter Filled 1970 Comedy LP! Woody Woodbury talks about Beyond the Valley of the Dolls, The Strawberry Alarm Clock, and his starring role in the rare 1964 Beach Party Film, For Those Who Think Young! Woody talks about working with GNP Crescendo Surf Instrumentalists The Challengers! The Story of Adults Only Comedy Record Maven Davey Bold! Woody Tells Tales of Vying for The Tonight Show, Guest Hosting for a Vacationing Steve Allen, and replacing Johnny Carson as host of the Classic Game Show Who Do You Trust? Steve Allen's 1955 Comedy Record Cut: What Is A Freem? Selections from The Tonight Show Record! The Baroque Inevitable Play Eleanor Rigby - Baroque Style! Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis swearing - Jerry calls his fans Cocksuckers!!!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Woody Woodbury Interview Part 2!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #10
item.description: Tomorrow Radio: An Album Explaining What Radio Will Be Like in 1983! Programmers Digest: An Audio Magazine for 1970s Radio DJs! TM Productions: How to Create A Winning Radio Station ID! William B. Tanner Comapny's Enjoy Yourself Radio Campaign Promo Record! Radio CJVI Victoria 1967 On-Air Radio Contest Acetate Record! Radio WDAK Promo seven inch about Columbus, Georgia! Seven Inch Single of Radio Spots Promoting Hay Bailers and Esoteric Farm Equipment! The Sounds of Radio WIMD's Cheesy Seventies Station IDs! Promo 45 for the awful 1979 Comedy Situation Comedy Minute Syndicated Radio Program! CJVI's 1955 Arrow Radiator Audio Documentary pressed on Accetate LP! Canadian Top 40: One Sided Vinyl Promo LP Featuring an Amusing Syndicated 1972 Canadian Radio Countdown Show! Funky Radio WQXI & Radio WTAE IDs with a lot of Ham from TM Productions! Rousing Song About Saskatchewan by The Rhythm Pals! Ballad of a (Radio) DJ by the Del Satins!
item.itunes:subtitle: a Radio Show about Radio

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #9
item.description: Strange 1970 LP: Murder at Kent State! Highlights from the satirical 1960s show That Was The Week That Was! LSD Records! Richard Pryor on Dropping Acid! Victor Lunderberg's 1968 Right Wing Vinyl Diatribe: In the Slime of Vietnam! 1965 Folk Song About the RCMP! Dick Davy: Only White Stand Up Comic to Headline The Apollo Theatre! Mort Sahl Jokes about Communism! Lenny Bruce chews the fat on Commies and Radio Free Europe! Dick Gregory! The Smothers Brothers vs. LBJ! John C. Croff with Al's Dynamics' Bizarre Vanity Pressing of Right Wing lo-fi Garage Rock Song that argues America Isn't Fighting Hard Enough in Vietnam! Cold War Era Bluegrass Music about the Atom Bomb! 1960 Rock N' Roll Novelty Song, Agnes Teenage Russian Spy! Rare Mercury Records LP from 1969: The Sound Of Dissent! The Fugs' Kill For Peace! Johnny Carson Interviews Tricky Dick Nixon on The Tonight Show!
item.itunes:subtitle: Comedy and the Cold War! Vietnam and Atomic Bombs! Comedians and Napalm!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #8
item.description:
Adults Only Comedy Record Legend Woody Woodbury Interview Pt.1! Over the top Showbusinnes Records: Ray Anthony Live at The Royal Hawaiian Hotel, Jackie Wilson Live at the Copa New York, On Stage: Alan Gale Live at Jack Silverman's International! Rare Adults Only Comedy Clips from Nino Nanni and Bill Carty! Late 60s Hollywood Squares Announcements from Kenny Williams! Norm Crosby Friar's Club Roast! Flip Wilson speaks out against Don Rickles! Plus three funky variations of the theme from The Bob Newhart Show!
In the words of Jackie Wilson, "If only I were able, I'd stop at each and ev-ur-ee table, and say, hey! You're dyn-o-mite!"
item.itunes:subtitle: A Salute To Old Showbizness!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #7
item.description: A Rare & Bizarre Psychedelic Comedy Record from late Smothers Brothers Comedy Hour writer Murray Roman! Autry Inman Adults Only Lounge Comedy! Stan Freberg rails against Television! Classic Counter-Culture Comedy LP: A Child's Garden of Grass! John Giminez, Christian Anti-marijuana Q&A! 1970s Dr. Pepper ad! Superfriends Theme Song! Barnes & Barnes Fisheads! Wild Man Fischer's cover version of Fishheads!
item.itunes:subtitle: Murray Roman: You Can't Beat People Up and Expect Them To Say I Love You!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #6
item.description:
Sidney Poitier's Journeys Inside the Mind! Bill Cosby sings the Beatles! Evel Knievel recites his poetry! A song about Evel Knievel(that skips)! Background Music from the late 60s Spiderman Cartoon! The 1975 Justice League of America vinyl record! Marcy, Christian Ventriloquist Doll, denounces Satan!
A 1979 interview: Tom Snyder speaks with Terry Jones, Michael Palin and Graham Chapman on the problems one encounters trying to make fun of Christianity in America!
item.itunes:subtitle: Rare 1979 Interview with 3 Pythons!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #5
item.description:
Dinner with Dracula from John Zacherele, the B-Side of Monster Mash, Igor's Cellar by The Detergents, Billy Strange Rawks out with The Munsters, Jonanthon Winters on Horror Movies, Stereophonic Two Headed (beatnik) Monster, Peter Lorre (Paul Frees) singing My Old Flame, Charlie, Linus, Vince Guaraldi Trio and the Great Pumpkin!
The Hee Haw Original Television Soundtrack, Red Sovine Phantom 309, Brumley Prunk's He'd Better Go, WSM Grand Ole Opry Star Cousin Minnie Pearl! Terrible low budget late 60s comedy LP: Rocky & Hal Live at The Eagles Hall Shonomish, Washington! Steel Guitar Instrumental of Mrs. Robinson!
item.itunes:subtitle: Halloween & Hillbillies! Redneck Frankensteins and Inbred Vampires!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #4
item.description: The Yardbirds rawking Blow Up soundtrack LP! An awful lo-fi 1975 comedy LP recorded in a shopping mall! Let My People Come, A Sexual Musical! Mad Magazine Twists Rock N Roll! Phyllis Diller Sings! The Smothers Brothers on US Foreign Policy! JFK Sings(again)! Don Knotts & Andy Griffith Grape Nuts Ad! Nichols & May name dropping! Emil Vierlinger: Stand Up Comedy in German! Joe E. Ross' Nightclub Act! Flintstones encourage you to smoke Winston Cigarettes!
item.itunes:subtitle: Static Galore! Just Pretend it's late nite AM Radio

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #3
item.description: Allan Sherman vs.The Beatles! Tony Hendra's Hilarious John Lennon Impression! 1960s Philadelphia Comedy Team Fischer & Marks' Odd Record: It's A Coo-Coo Beatle World! Who "Talks" A Beatles Cover Better - Shatner or Tony Bennett? Rusty Warren Banned in Boston! Canadian Christian Sex Education LP from 1960! Sheldon, Sheldon, Sheldon: A Dated Novelty Song About an Orthodox Jew Turned Hippy! Victor Lundberg's Terrifying Ultimatum: To The Flower Power!
item.itunes:subtitle: Comedy vs. The Beatles!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #2
item.description: Anti-Communist Garage Rock from John G. Croft with Al's Dynamics! Strange Yiddish Comedy Records! A Filmstrip LP from 1960 about the Steel Industry! Morgan Freeman Sings! Moms Mabely Sings! Match Game '73! JFK Sings! Allen & Rossi Joke about Henry Miller! Stan Freberg! Jerry Colonna's Music For Screaming! Plenty More!
item.itunes:subtitle: When Communists Attack!

item.title: Generation Exploitation Podcast #1
item.description: Don Knotts is The Love God! Moms Mabely Jokes About Marijuana and Sings! Horrible 1970s Drag Queen Lounge Schlock! Bizarre Chrisitian talk show callers! Rolf Harris shills for the Stylophone on a forgotten 45! Senator Sam J. Erwin's talking rendition of Bridge Over Troubled Water! Stan Freberg's John & Marsha as interpreted by Peter Sellers and Joan Collins! Mister S. of the Letter People, Sings About His Super Socks ... the greatest children's seven inch EVER MADE!
item.itunes:subtitle: What is "The Stylophone?"
